actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA & SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business Problems
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on SBA & SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business Problems.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA and SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business

official_title: A bill to increase to $500,000 the maximum annual receipts certain agricultural businesses may have and still be treated as small businesses for certain purposes.

summary.text: States that a qualified agricultural concern which would (but for its annual receipts) be treated as a small business concern shall be treated as a small business concern if its annual receipts do not exceed $500,000.

titles.title: A bill to increase to $500,000 the maximum annual receipts certain agricultural businesses may have and still be treated as small businesses for certain purposes.
